meanings.definition: The hard, woody stems of a tropical plant, used for construction and crafts.
meanings.sent1: The bamboos were cut and shaped to build a small hut.
meanings.sent2: The pandas love to eat the tender shoots of bamboos.
meanings.sent3: The crafty squirrel used bamboos to make a tiny swing for itself.
meanings.sent4: Her determination was as strong as bamboos in a storm.
meanings.sent5: The sound of wind rustling through the bamboos was soothing.

meanings.definition: A plant of the grass family, with hollow stems and jointed nodes.
meanings.sent1: In Asia, pandas feast on the leaves of bamboos.
meanings.sent2: The garden was decorated with beautiful bamboos swaying in the breeze.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous monkey used bamboos to play a prank on its friend.
meanings.sent4: The bamboo forest stood tall and proud like a green army.
meanings.sent5: The bamboos whispered secrets to each other in the moonlight.

meanings.sent1: She tried to bamboos her brother into thinking it was his turn to do the dishes.
meanings.sent2: The con artist used his charm to bamboos people out of their money.
meanings.sent3: The magician bamboos the audience with his sleight of hand tricks.
meanings.sent4: Her sweet smile could bamboos anyone into believing her lies.
meanings.sent5: The tricky fox knew how to bamboos the other animals in the forest.
